database.name: massive
database.description: The Massive Database contains information about all the proteomics/metabolomics datasets in massive

entry.name: GNPS Streptococcus mutans biofilm
entry.description: Streptococcus mutans were grown in rich SHI-medium as biofilms anaerobically. Biofilms were starved in minimal medium followed by glucose amendment (at pH 7). Replicate samples for MS/MS-small molecule and transcription analyses were collected at pH 7 and at pH 3.5 (20 hrs after glucose spiking). Only secreted molecules were analyzed with MS/MS (no cell lysis protocol was employed).
